body:
@bcmills 
It would not work.
You are basically using the compiler to change the API behind the scenes by using aliasing here.
It forces the recursive compilation of everything that depends on the old net/context.

In a refactoring setting, one would expect the dependency boundaries to remain the same.

In a migration setting, then that's another story. But I thought the proposal was about refactoring. (The proposal is indeed confusing since it mentions updating clients)
